name: Don't Fall Asleep !
description:
Story

The weekend is already well underway, and you still haven’t worked on your entry for the Ludum Dare 50. But nothing is lost! You just need to stay up all night, post your game and finally you will be able rest.

Hurry up! Complete all the tasks that any Jammer would do, while taking care not to fall asleep. It’s easy to do: drink coffee, do sports… but be careful not to overwork yourself. In a hurry, take care not to do anything stupid. It’s all about balance.

 How to play
  • Use WASD to move
  • Click on objects to interact
    • Some make you tired 
    • Some wake you up 
  • Computer :
    • You can leave it by clicking the exit button (bottom-left corner)
    • Play all the mini-games (buttons)
      • Tower building uses Arrow Keys
      • Pixel art also uses Right Click to erase tiles
    • Submit your game
    •  can be skipped 
 They talk about it There are many aspects to creating a game in 72 hours… but sleep is not one of them.
Relive the Ludum Dare experience in this ambitious first-person game. With a multitude of choices, impressive realism and stunning graphics, “Don’t Fall Asleep !” will become your most vivid memory reflecting the excitement of the game development process.
From a cup of coffee to creative mini-games, discover your own path to success in the jam. Like the passionate artists and engineers from around the world who designed this game, you too can reach the deadline with confidence - and style. Play “Don’t Fall Asleep !” for free today!
